ü™ü Windows Launchers

start-bot-manager.bat

The main Windows launcher that provides a complete setup experience:

  • Professional Interface: Color-coded console with clear instructions
  • Dependency Management: Automatic npm install and build process
  • Environment Setup: Creates .env file from template
  • Configuration Validation: Checks Discord token setup
  • Data Directory Setup: Creates necessary folders
  • Build Process: Compiles TypeScript to JavaScript
  • Intents Configuration: Detailed Discord intents setup guide
‚ö†Ô∏è Critical Setup Required: You must enable Discord bot intents in the Discord Developer Portal for the bot to function properly.

troubleshoot.bat

Comprehensive diagnostic tool for Windows systems:

  • System Diagnostics: Windows version, memory, and disk space
  • Node.js Verification: Checks installation and version compatibility
  • Project Structure: Validates file organization
  • Network Testing: Internet connectivity and Discord server access
  • Permission Checks: File access and execution permissions
  • Common Solutions: Provides fixes for typical issues

üêß Linux Launchers

start-linux.sh

Advanced Linux launcher with enhanced features:

  • Color-coded Interface: Beautiful terminal output with emojis
  • System Requirements: Checks Node.js version and dependencies
  • File Permissions: Sets proper executable permissions
  • TypeScript Compilation: Builds and validates compiled files
  • Command Loading Test: Verifies bot functionality
  • Comprehensive Setup: Complete environment configuration
# Make executable and run chmod +x start-linux.sh ./start-linux.sh

troubleshoot.sh

Advanced diagnostic tool for Linux systems:

  • OS Detection: Identifies Linux distribution and version
  • System Resources: Memory, disk space, and architecture
  • Dependency Verification: Node.js, npm, and build tools
  • File System Checks: Permissions and directory structure
  • Network Diagnostics: Internet and Discord connectivity
  • Compilation Testing: TypeScript build verification
# Run diagnostics chmod +x troubleshoot.sh ./troubleshoot.sh

üîß Setup Instructions

Windows Setup

  1. Download and extract the Discord bot files
  2. Double-click start-bot-manager.bat
  3. Follow the automated setup process
  4. Edit the .env file with your Discord bot token
  5. Enable required Discord intents in Developer Portal
  6. Run npm start to launch the bot

Linux Setup

  1. Download and extract the Discord bot files
  2. Open terminal in the bot directory
  3. Make scripts executable: chmod +x *.sh
  4. Run setup: ./start-linux.sh
  5. Edit .env with your Discord bot token
  6. Enable required Discord intents in Developer Portal
  7. Launch with npm start
‚úÖ Pro Tip: For voice features on Linux, install FFmpeg: sudo apt install ffmpeg

üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting

Common Issues & Solutions

‚ùå "Disallowed Intents" Error

Solution: Enable all three Privileged Gateway Intents in Discord Developer Portal:

  • ‚úÖ PRESENCE INTENT
  • ‚úÖ SERVER MEMBERS INTENT
  • ‚úÖ MESSAGE CONTENT INTENT

‚ùå "Invalid Token" Error

Solution: Check your .env file has the correct Discord bot token

‚ùå "Permission denied" Error (Linux)

Solution: Run chmod +x *.sh to set executable permissions

‚ùå "Cannot find module" Error

Solution: Run npm install then npm run build

‚ùå Voice features not working

Solution: Install FFmpeg: sudo apt install ffmpeg
